What you need

Large bowl

4 cups of ice

Cold water

4 cups of solid vegetable
shortening (like Crisco)

4 medium-size sealable
plastic bags

Step One

Large bowl

4 cups of ice

Cold water

Fill your bowl
with water and ice

Step Two

4 cups of solid vegetable
shortening (like Crisco)

4 medium-size sealable
plastic bags

Put shortening in plastic bag

Shortening is a kind of fat and fat
is what Polar Bears have under their skin.

Step Three

Cover your right hand with another plastic
bag. Then place that hand inside the
plastic bag with the fat and seal.
Move the fat around until it covers
your hand. Cover your left hand with the
remaining two plastic bags
(without fat) and seal.

Step Four

Put hands in water

Set a timer for 30 seconds and
put both hands in the bowl of ice water.

Are you sure you
want to quit?

Are you sure you
want to quit?
